aws:RequestTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by a tag key that is present in the request

aws:ResourceTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by a tag key component of a tag associated to the IoT resource in the request

aws:TagKeys.description: Filters access by a list of tag keys associated to the IoT resource in the request

iot:ClientMode.description: Filters access by the mode of the client for IoT Tunnel

iot:Delete.description: Filters access by a flag indicating whether or not to also delete an IoT Tunnel immediately when making iot:CloseTunnel request

iot:DomainName.description: Filters access by based on the domain name of an IoT DomainConfiguration

iot:ThingGroupArn.description: Filters access by a list of IoT Thing Group ARNs that the destination IoT Thing belongs to for an IoT Tunnel

iot:TunnelDestinationService.description: Filters access by a list of destination services for an IoT Tunnel
